title: Tree plantation shall be done at the rate of 500 Trees / Ha
clause_text: Tree plantation shall be done at the rate of 500 Trees / Ha. on the remaining land excluding the built up area and the surrounding open space / utility space.
section: Biotechnology Units / Park to be allowed in No Development Zone earmarked in the Development / Regional Plan.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Tree plantation shall be done at the rate of 500 Trees / Ha. on the remaining land excluding the built up area and the surrounding open space / utility space.
